pages.text: $(italic)Your hands were shaking, as you brought this idea onto paper. This is going to be big.$(/italic)$(br2)Producing INK is a tedious process: from collecting $(l:general/shards)Gemstone Shards$(/l), $(l:general/anvil_crushing)crushing them$(/l), $(l:general/colored_trees)creating trees$(/l) just to cut them down again for their $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l), just to convert it into INK in the $(l:magic/color_picker)Color Picker$(/l).$(br)$(italic)Time to cut out all these intermediate stages.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Inkwell, placed on a $(l:magic/gemstone_farmer)Gemstone Farmer$(/l) directly converts the geodes energy into INK, allowing it to be transmitted via $(l:magic/ink_duct)Ink Ducsts$(/l).
